name: Tuscan Sausage and Chard Soup
author: Peach822
summary: A wonderful and quick soup. Serve with a good crusty bread and some vino!
ingredients: ½ pound bulk mild Italian sausage
directions: Heat a large pot over medium-high heat and stir in the sausage
Cook and stir until sausage is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink, about 5 minutes
Drain and discard any excess grease
Stir onion and red bell pepper into sausage; cook and stir until vegetables begin to soften, about 3 minutes
Pour water into the pot; add Swiss chard, chicken bouillon, garlic salt, and Italian seasoning
Cover and reduce heat to medium-low; Simmer until vegetables are very tender, about 20 minutes
Sprinkle soup with Parmesan cheese before serving
